name: Puddle Sailor
description:
This is a videogame made for the #MeninasJam organized by Universidade da Coruña and Videoxogo.gal. The topic was "Barcos, barcos, y más barcos" (boats, boats and more boats), so we made a nut-boat four our little friend who loves to sail in the puddles.

Francisco Javier Pascual was the programmer and developer
https://www.linkedin.com/in/francisco-javier-pascual-vidal-1b7a5a1b0/

Lizartonne was the game designer, the artist and sound creatorhttps://www.artstation.com/lizartonne

We hope you enjoy!
